verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Thursday] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that he was calling off the greatly anticipated U.S .- North Korea summit because the other party was acting in bad faith going into it , something the President promised to do weeks ago] . Of course , many in the liberal media used the opportunity to suggest it was somehow a diplomatic blunder on his part despite nuclear threats by the regime

Of course , many in the liberal media used the opportunity to suggest it was somehow a diplomatic blunder on his part despite nuclear threats by the regime
